title: There are some opinions that are too dangerous for the boards

replies.body: Jhin main delays last shot. More of this story on "News at 5".

> [{quoted}](name=Escheton,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=T4hHvGQn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-15T19:56:27.123+0000)
>
> Jhin main delays last shot. More of this story on "News at 5".

News at FOUR.

You had one job...
This man gets it. Letâ€™s get him to 4 upvotes to honor him.
Wait, is this a Jhin thread now?
Yes. Because here, we can actually downvote to preserve beauty.
I agree - but it looks like there's been some sabotage...
Not guilty! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I got you

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
OBJECTION! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I can assure you that this thread was not un*four*tunate enough to get hit by the heathens that make it a mission to ruin perfection.
We must **four**tify our defenses against these **four**ign intruders

....

This is why I both love and hate Jhin threads.

The ceaseless FOUR puns.

Why is Jhin a great romancer? 

He's good at _Four_ play.
 also could we get a jhin post with 256 (=4x4x4x4) upvotes.
What's Jhins job? A lumberjack, otherwise known as a **four**ester

Not ceaseless. There are four of them in this thread
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Boulderox,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=T4hHvGQn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-15T19:59:12.579+0000)
>
> News at FOUR.
> 
> You had one job...

Too obvious mate. Also, what news gets broadcasted at 4?
Channel 4, duh.

+1
Thats actually witty.
4/4 would upvote if you didn't already have 4
I would downvote you more, but you're already at -4, and I don't want to ruin it.

> [{quoted}](name=Boulderox,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=T4hHvGQn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-15T19:59:12.579+0000)
>
> News at FOUR.
> 
> You had one job...

News at three, he didn't shoot the last bullet.
Four upvotes. hmmmmm
so... do we downvote him to -4 for failing the job? or still give him the 4 upvotes?
Why do I actually do this when I ult as Jhin?
Because the 4th shot is heavier. It needs some build-up.
Me, playing Jhin: *ults* 1, 2, 3... pause for effect... 4!
I like how this entire comment chain is at 4 upvotes
Except us {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

You're almost there!

Dang, wish I could give two upvotes for this purpose only...
When your patrons the Secret Ionian council is more concerned about you stopping at three, than petty details like shooting your kid.

Potentially unpopular opinion: Yasuo is actually pretty balanced.

He's just frustrating as all fuck to play against. Hence the reason I ban him. Every. Single. Game.

It really IS the frustration that makes us wanna ban Yasuo and not anything else.

Except Frozen Force Yasuo. That was a stupid build and was rightfully banned.
my tank crit build for teemo is awesom. statik shiv, rapid fire canon, runaans huricane, blade of the ruined king, frozen malet, warmogs
This is why I have beholder hallucinations chase meta-nancers in DnD.
I can respect that
fuck that on hit tankmo is the way to go.
The father made the right call.
http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m6rtqvw1eK1qhbnv4o4_250.gif
Rip my 46% win rate boi. No but actually tho is op.gg right. He doesnt feel that weak. Maybe... Maybe he needs buffs mwehehehehe

its funny cause its true ..

you only have to say yasuo is fun or balanced to trigger a lot of people :|
